# RCSService.Business.Menu

**Structure**

A menu provided by business.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Menu
```

## Accessing menu properties

- **title**: Title for menu.
- **contents**: Array of menu contents.
- **RCSService.Business.Menu.Content**: Enumeration defining the contents of menu.

## Accessing display information

- **themeColor**: Theme color to apply to conversation view.
- **backgroundImageURL**: Background image to apply to business information page.
- **styleSheetTemplateURL**: URL referring to a CSS template to be used in rich cards sent by business.
- **persistentMenu**: Persistent menu with a nested collection of suggested replies and suggested actions.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
